title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When attempting to close all saved files, sometimes the files are not closed
EB: All the saved files should be closed without any error or exception
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application
2. Save all the files
3. Select the 'Close all saved' option from the menu
4. Verify that all the saved files are closed without any error or exception
